message: I wonder what time it is now.
I'm honestly getting a little tired...

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, you look kinda tired.
Are you okay？
Cordelia asked, hiding her naked body with the sheet.
The bed is a complete mess, and to top it off, it feels a bit damp with our sweat.

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, I'm fine.
You don't need to worry about me.

name: Cordelia
message: It really hurt a lot...

name: Cordelia
message: But I'm somehow really happy.
Jonathan, thank you.
I'm not really sure what to do when she thanks me like that.
That angry face from earlier seems like a lie now.
What a hot-tempered wild girl she is...
Well, it can't be helped.
There still seems to be a big gap between us, but we'll probably close it someday. After all, we've only just met.
Cordelia is puffing out her cheeks and making it obvious she's in a bad mood, just like a sulky kid.
If it weren't for this situation, I'd say that look is 'cute,' but now's really not the time to be thinking about that.
But still, there's no way her mood is just going to get better like this...
But if I just obediently stay at the Gilman House like they said, who knows what Gardner and the others will say to me tomorrow morning.

name: Cordelia
message: Why are you staring at my face like that！
If you don't want to be with me, why don't you just hurry up and go back to the Fish Scale Inn？

name: Jonathan
message: I never said I didn't want to be with you, did I？
It's just, if we spend the night together, in a tiny village like this, rumors will spread in no time.

name: Cordelia
message: What's the problem with that, exactly？
I honestly don't care about stuff like that.

name: Jonathan
message: It's not that simple. You're a precious woman before marriage. Bad rumors about being an indecent woman wouldn't be good！

name: Cordelia
message: Oh, come on… You're just worried about yourself getting talked about, aren't you? Am I not good enough for you?

name: Jonathan
message: That's not what I'm saying at all！
I'm only giving you advice because I care about you.

name: Cordelia
message: God, you're so full of yourself！

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, aren't you hungry？
I can make you something if you want.
Cordelia's face is still flushed from what we did earlier, her cheeks tinged red.

After spending a busy day, you hardly have any time to rest your body with all this lovemaking with me. Exhaustion is clear on your face. But, your expression is much brighter and more satisfied than when we first met.

name: Cordelia
message: What's wrong, Jonathan？

name: Jonathan
message: What is it?

name: Cordelia
message: You keep staring at my face all this time.
Are you thinking, 'this isn't how it was supposed to be'？

name: Jonathan
message: Don't say stupid things.
Do　I　look　like　the　kind　of　guy　who'd　make　excuses　like,　'I　was　just　drunk　earlier'？

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder about that.
I don't really get it, though？

name: Jonathan
message: That's awful.

name: Cordelia
message: That's a lie.
I trust you, so relax.
It's not exactly voluptuous, but it's just the right size for me.
I'm not really into women with cow-like boobs.
Guys who like that sort of thing can go chase after working girls all they want.
Cordelia is petite and you can't really call her body voluptuous or womanly, but that's its own kind of charm.
Cordelia is covering her bare chest with a wrinkled Sheet.
You really can't figure women out.
Just a moment ago, I was so caught up in the act, all sense of shame felt like it disappeared, but as soon as it was over, I suddenly got embarrassed again.
I'm so exhausted tonight that I don't even have it in me to be moved by Cordelia's gorgeous legs.
I just want to find somewhere-anywhere-to rest and heal this tiredness.
That's all I want right now.
The important part is hidden under the sheet, so I can't see it.
I feel a little disappointed, but there's no way I could ever go for a woman who has no sense of shame or embarrassment at all, so I guess this is fine.
If I had a bit more stamina, I'd feel like going again, but tonight I'm just way too tired. Better to save it for another time, for my own good.
I wonder when was the last time I changed the wallpaper.
It's a gloomy wallpaper that doesn't look like it was chosen with any special care.
It really is a cheaply made, thin wall.
I didn't pay attention to it in the heat of the moment, but with walls this thin, won't our voices leak out?
At this time of night, there's probably no one who'd go out of their way to come ask...
Maybe I'm just getting a little too nervous.

name: Jonathan
message: What a hopeless girl.
Since　when　did　you　become　such　a　spoiled　child？

name: Cordelia
message: Sorry for being selfish......
But　tonight,　I　just　don't　want　to　be　alone.

name: Jonathan
message: Got it.
You　should　just　do　whatever　makes　you　feel　better.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm really sorry......

name: Jonathan
message: That's enough. Come on, share half your bed with me.
You're not really going to make me sleep on the hard floor, are you？

name: Cordelia
message: I wasn't planning on it.
Hurry up and get in, or I'll freeze from the cold.

name: Cordelia
message: If you really insist on going home, then that promise from earlier is off. You can search for Marsh's house and the Archives on your own！
What a troublesome girl.
I'm happy that you depend on me, but I'd like you to think about my position too.

name: Jonathan
message: Alright, let's meet up at the Fish Scale Inn tomorrow morning.
It's already late tonight. I should go back to my room and take a break for a bit.

name: Cordelia
message: You're leaving...? I thought you were staying over?
You promised you'd always stay with me, right?

name: Cordelia
message: That's mean, Jonathan.
Hey, please stay with me.

name: Jonathan
message: But my room's at the Fish Scale Inn, so won't we see each other again come tomorrow morning?
Cordelia's expression hardened, and she showed obvious anger, as if her earlier good mood had been a lie.

name: Cordelia
message: No way, I want to be with you tonight, Jonathan！
Why　do　you　say　you　have　to　hurry　home?

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia, don't be so unreasonable.
Just　gotta　hang　in　there　until　tomorrow　morning,　right?

name: Cordelia
message: But you promised you'd stay with me！

name: Jonathan
message: Don't act like a child.

name: Jonathan
message: Aren't you the one who's tired, Cordelia?
You should rest without worrying about me.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah......
By the way, what are Jonathan and the others going to do tomorrow？

name: Jonathan
message: I'll go visit the house of that old man Marsh you told me about. I need to ask the old man about those ruins, and I haven't even started my own research yet.

name: Cordelia
message: ......Can't I come with you too？

name: Jonathan
message: You？
Then what about the shop?

name: Cordelia
message: I have no choice but to rest, but...... I want to know too.　　　　　　　Why I came to this village, and where　　　　　　　　　　　　I was before that.

name: Jonathan
message: Did your adoptive parents not teach you anything？
Tell me how it came about that you ended up being taken in by those people.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah. Before I could hear that, I ended up all alone.

name: Jonathan
message: If you come with me, that'll be a huge help.
And you'll show me Marsh the old man's house, too.

name: Cordelia
message: It's no big deal. Besides, about that woman Jonathan was talking about, if we check out the Archives, we might be able to find some clues.

name: Jonathan
message: The Archives, huh？
I had no idea something like that existed in this village.

name: Cordelia
message: Originally, it was a prestigious school called 'Miskatonic University.' They say it was shut down decades ago, but now it's the village's Archives.

name: Cordelia
message: Ah... If you do that, I won't be able to sleep.
Jonathan, you're tired, aren't you？

name: Cordelia
message: No way！
Don't touch me.

name: Cordelia
message: If you do that, you'll get in a weird mood again.
Jonathan, you're tired, aren't you？

name: Jonathan
message: I've never seen such beautiful hair before.
Why don't you usually wear your hair down？

name: Cordelia
message: Because it gets in the way of work, and when I'm working, I don't want to be conscious of being a woman.

name: Jonathan
message: Dealing with roughneck fishermen, that might actually be the smarter thing to do.

name: Cordelia
message: But it's fine for now.
Because I want to show Jonathan my best, prettiest self.
I ran my fingers through Cordelia's messy hair.
Her long, straight black hair shines with a glossy luster.

name: Cordelia
message: That tickles, Jonathan......

name: Jonathan
message: Alright then, I’ll take you up on your offer and take half the bed.　　　　　　　　You’re not a messy sleeper, right？

name: Cordelia
message: How rude.
Do you really think I'm gonna kick you out of Bed in the middle of the night？

name: Jonathan
message: I just hope that's not the case.

name: Cordelia
message: You're such a jerk！
It's fine, I don't toss and turn in my sleep.

name: Jonathan
message: Thank goodness.
I don't think I snore or grind my teeth either.
I slipped in next to Cordelia.
The sheet was cold, but the warmth of Cordelia next to me made me feel like I was reclaiming a peace I'd long forgotten.

name: Cordelia
message: Good night... Don't go anywhere until morning, okay?

name: Jonathan
message: You should stop worrying about unnecessary things.
There aren't many hours left until morning, so hurry up and get to sleep.

name: Cordelia
message: Good night...... Jonathan.
It seems like I'm way too tired tonight.
Just touching the bed, which doesn't really look all that comfortable, makes me feel like I'd fall asleep right away.
The sheet is damp, soaked with mine and Cordelia's sweat.
It's almost like it's telling the story of how intense our lust is-it kind of makes me feel a little embarrassed, I can't deny it.
If this were a hotel room and the maid was about to come in for bed making, I'd be racking my brain over how to explain the messed-up, damp Sheet.
